## ClassificationDetail type

Classsification details for a particular field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ClassificationDetail = {
    $type?: string;
    Category?: Link;
    FieldName?: string;
    FieldPath?: string;
    IsMetadataField?: boolean;
    Keywords?: Array<Link>;
};
```
